Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Bug Bottle# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Can't find an item? Scan an Amiibo.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Gerudo Mask#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key Ring# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Song of Time#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #2# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Bottom

SFM (Saria).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Deku Shield#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Gerudo Mask#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Did you know that ReDead eat their defeated friends?

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a chest spawned by #Sun's Song#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.
